HOME.DESCRIPTION: I specialize in providing comprehensive and effective full-stack solutions. deep understanding of front-end frameworks, skilled in back-end development, and focus on achieving seamless integration.

CONTENT: I am a passionate web developer with over 2 years of experience and a dedicated student at the Faculty of Engineering in Uruguay . I enjoy building web applications using a wide range of technologies, always striving to create excellent and clean solutions for challenging problems .
In my free time, you'll find me honing my skills on HackerRank, diving into tech articles, and enjoying a good game of chess 锔.

ITEMS.TITLE: Montevideo COMM
CONTENT: As a software developer at Montevideo COMM, I have played a key role in designing and maintaining innovative technological solutions. My expertise is primarily focused on front-end development, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with GeneXus for back-end implementation.

Throughout my career, I have been involved in a wide range of projects, contributing to the development of custom applications for clients, as well as internal company projects such as Montevideo Portal.

ITEMS.TITLE: University | Self projects
CONTENT: During my time at UDELAR, I have been immersed in the Computer Engineering program, where I have acquired a solid foundation of knowledge in technology and web development.

However, my learning didn't stop in the classrooms. I have dedicated time outside of the curriculum to delve into web application development, exploring various technologies both in the front-end and back-end. This personal initiative has allowed me to expand my skills beyond what is taught in class and develop a comprehensive understanding of web programming.
Through personal projects and self-directed experimentation, I have strengthened my ability to tackle technical challenges and find innovative solutions.

ITEMS.TITLE: Spotify Clone
ITEMS.CONTENT: A simplified clone of the Spotify application, created with TypeScript + React + Express.

ITEMS.TITLE: Space Invader
ITEMS.CONTENT: Recreated from the classic arcade game Space Invaders, entirely made with TypeScript.

ITEMS.CONTENT: The usual chess game, but the computer's moves are made with artificial intelligence.
